name: Samagra Jan Akanksha Seva Sansthan

address: H.O :- Fatehpur , PO - Jogapatti , Dist - West Champaran (Bihar)

briefDescription: Our mission statement is “transformational development of the people through participatory practices on sustained basis", having special focus on women and child. At present our organization is undertaking various activities under the following components:	Women and child development programs, sustainable rural development programs, campaign on child labour, street children, environment, panchayats raj, women and child rights, campaign against women feticides etc.	Raising funds through local contributions and member’s efforts and support to give pace to the development. In this connection several national and international donors are providing support. We aim to raise much financial support for other operations also through communicatin
